name: Spin Maze
description:
Get the Germ out of the maze

Press “A” to rotate the maze clockwise and “D” to rotate it counter-clockwise

Press “W” to increase maze rotation speed and “S” to decrease maze rotation speed

Press “P” to skip a level

Press “O” to restart level

-------------------------------------------------

Game by:

Abdullah Allami and Eric Vander-Horst
